summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Land Use and Zoning; amending Plat 4W, Page 40 of the Official Land Use Map to rezone property located at 8401 Aurora Avenue North from Lowrise 3 (L-3) and Single Family residential 5000 (SF 5000) to Commercial 1 with a 40 foot height limit (C-1 40') Zone and accepting a Property Use and Development Agreement in connection therewith. (Petition of Ray Terry; C.F. 295358).
